item.description:
The October 11 Mobilizing Committee is off and running. We've got a lot of work to build a large march and rally in Boston this fall.

Organizations attending our initial meetings agreed to immediately start getting out the word about the October 11 action. The October 11 Mobilizing Committee has submitted applications for a permit for a rally on Boston Common. The March route is still under discussion.

Various subcommittees which have been meeting and we also have a website

http://oct11boston.or...

and listserv which all are invited to join. The address is:

oct11boston@googlegroups.com

Discussions are proceeding around demands and the program. Much is being done and there is much more to do.

Please join us at our next planning meeting as we prepare to mobilize and demand the immediate and unconditional withdrawal of all occupation forces from Iraq and the closing of all military bases. All are invited.

Looking forward to seeing you all there.

Saturday, Sept. 6, 3:00 PM
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, 5th Floor
Boston (in Chinatown)


Proposed Agenda:

1) Vote in chair and note taker

2) Introductions 5 minutes

3) Subcommittee Reports

a) Logistics Report 20 minutes

b) Program 15 minutes

c) Outreach 15 minutes

d) Website/Media 5 minutes

e) Fundraising/Finances 10 minutes

4) Next Meeting 5 minutes

5) Announcements 5 minutes

6) Break into Subcommittees 45 minutes

Adjourn
item.name: October 11 Planning Meeting
